newsitem.title: USA: Telegen completes merger with Solar Energy.
newsitem.headline: Telegen completes merger with Solar Energy.

text.p: Telegen Corp and Solar Energy Research Corp Wednesday said they completed their previously-announced merger.
Following the merger, the company is operating as Telegen and has approximately 4.7 million shares of common stock outstanding.

Under the terms of the merger, the officers and directors of Solar Energy have resigned and been replaced by the officers and directors of Telegen. The company's new officers and directors are: Jessica Stevens, 45, president, chief executive and director; Bonnie Crystal, 42, executive vice president and director; Warren Dillard, 54, chief operating officer, chief financial officer and director; Frederick Lezak, 54, director; James Iverson, 67, director; and Larry Wells, 53, director.
Telegen is a diversified high-technology company with products available or under development for Flat Panel Display, Telecommunications and Internet applications.
